text: Aazhikkoru Muthu is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Shophy, starring Ratheesh and Sukumaran in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Ratheesh as Raveendran * Sukumaran as Prabhakaran * Seema as Sreedevi * Sumithra * Aranmula Ponnamma * Indrans * Kuthiravattam Pappu * Sairabhanu * Shivaji * Sreenath * Vanitha Krishnachandran * Vincent ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Aazhikkoru Muthu
